string-array.name: coolyou_problem_array
string-array.item: How do I check the backup and synced data?
How do I retrieve the mis-deleted data?
How do I retrieve phone data if I have changed or lost my phone?
Why does it notify me of permission issues?
What do I do when contacts are duplicated?
What do I do when I have forgotten CoolCloud password?
How many accounts can be registered on the same phone?
What is the helpline of CoolCloud?

string-array.name: coolyou_problem_answer_array
string-array.item: A: Log in to www.coolyun.com with your CoolCloud account for data management. We have launched an equivalent site m.coolyun.com for easier visits over your phone.
A: CoolCloud syncs only data different from before. After compression, a sync of 100 contacts consumes only 5 KB of data.
A: The Trash feature is available at www.coolyun.com to help restore data in case of mis-deletion.
A: After you log in to CoolCloud with your account, the backup data, such as contacts, agenda, memos, messages, and call logs, can be restored to the new phone.
A: Log in to www.coolyun.com, go to the Contacts module, and use the Remove duplicate feature.
A: Touch Forgot on the login page, enter your email or phone number, and redirect to the reset URL to reset your password.
A: A maximum of 5 CoolCloud accounts can be registered on the same phone.
A: The latest version of CoolCloud is available at m.coolyun.com and CoolMart.
A: The helpline is 029-88824132. Your calls are warmly welcomed.
